reviews.review:
This movie was very well done. If I have to criticize any part, I would say it seemed a little rushed in the 1st half. That's however understandable given all they had to cover. They still did a good job with it...and the 2nd half was outstanding.
The comedy was well placed, there was genuine emotion like the last scene with Peter Parker, and there were cheer-out-loud moments like Thor arriving on earth. Character interactions between avengers that had never previously met were perfectly written.  Right off the bat, Thanos was made out to be a villain that had to be taken seriously, while at the same time, given a bit of background and story arc - cough snoke cough-
Lucasfilm needs to watch this movie a dozen times and take notes. Yes, you can be different and bold while still staying true to previously established characters and movie lore to give fans a movie they like. It CAN  be done. You don't have to destroy everything that came before. Yes you can have strong female characters that are well written(Gamora, Scarlett Witch, Black Widow, etc) and given good character arcs without having to shoehorn them in.

Avengers: Infinity War is a full emotional ride, with majestic visual and action pieces, as well as a varied and well-balanced mix of tones. It also involves great storytelling as the story forces the characters to take hard decisions that affect the plot. More than a movie, itÂ´s a very engaging theater experience.
So well put together as much star power in this movie I never felt as if characters where being left out great movie its a must to see on the big screen.
one of the greatest movies I've ever seen. what a piece of art.

This movie overall was a great movie. It had that rare blend of humor and being serious.There are parts in the movie that I think would be better to not have or change. For example, the length of the movie. It seems too long and if I wanted to watch it at home, I wouldn't watch it all.
With so many characters I didn't see how marvel could pull this movie off. I'm so glad I was wrong. What a great movie
overblown. Tries to cover too much material and never succeeds on any front.
its the best Super Hero movie I've ever seen.. And I loved the Dark Knight, Black Panther and Logan. There isn't even a close second to it.
Full of action and of comics characters that we love! Amazing movie!
